topic.title: EMS Physical Assessment Section - conformance rules

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.20"
SHALL conform to Consol Physical Exam Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.2.10)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10337)/@code="29545-1" Physical Assessment Section (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10336)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "EMS Physical Assessment Section" (CONF:10339)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:10338)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:10340)
This entry SHALL conform to Derived Entry template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)
This entry SHALL contain at least one [1..*] organizer (CONF:10346)
Such organizers MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component {subsets Organizer::component}
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="8335-2" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10363)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type PQ (CONF:10364)
NEMSIS Trace: EExam.01 UCUM units should be 'kg'
This observation Contains exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime
Such organizers MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component {subsets Organizer::component}
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10366)/@code="67670-0" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10365)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet LengthBasedWeightClass 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.24 STATIC (CONF:10367)
NEMSIS Trace: EExam.02. Note: a license is required to implement the Broselow-Luten measure.
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime
NEMSIS Trace: EExam.03
Such organizers MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component {subsets Organizer::component}
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10368)/@code="67524-9" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10369)
This component SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with data type CD (CONF:10370), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet SkinAssessment 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.25 STATIC (CONF:10371)
NEMSIS Trace: EExam.04
This component Contains exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime
NEMSIS Trace: EExam.03
Such organizers MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component {subsets Organizer::component}
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10373)/@code="67525-6" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10372)
This observation SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet HeadAssessmentFinding 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.26 STATIC (CONF:10374)
NEMSIS Trace: EExam.05
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime
NEMSIS Trace: EExam.03

This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10376)/@code="67526-4" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10375)
This observation SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with data type CD (CONF:10377), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet FaceAssessmentFinding 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.27 STATIC (CONF:10378)
NEMSIS Trace: EExam.06
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime

This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation

This observation SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet NeckAssessmentFinding 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.28 STATIC (CONF:10380)

This observation SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet ChestLungAssessmentFinding 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.29 STATIC (CONF:10382)

This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime

This observation SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with data type CD (CONF:10385), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet HeartAssessmentFinding 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.30 STATIC (CONF:10386)

This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet AbdomenAssessmentFinding 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.31 STATIC (CONF:10388)

This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] targetSiteCode, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet AbdominalFindingLocation 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.32 STATIC (CONF:10389)
